forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 9 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon sun casts a gentle glow over Downtown San Francisco, illuminating the city with a pleasant warmth. With temperatures hovering around 67 degrees, the air feels refreshing, especially as a brisk west-southwest wind, playfully wafting in at around 17 mph, stirs the leaves and brings a bit of vibrancy to the afternoon. The sky is mostly sunny—though a light veil of clouds hints at the arrival of evening, creating a serene backdrop against the architectural elegance of the city. 

As twilight beckons, the temperature is expected to settle around 57 degrees. A continuation of that agreeable wind, tapering to 9 to 16 mph, will wrap the afternoon in a gentle embrace. While the marine layer may linger along the coast, conspicuously absent from the downtown skyline, it serves as a reminder of nature's nuanced dance between sun and fog. Dress comfortably, perhaps opting for layers—a light jacket to fend off the evening chill paired with breathable fabrics to bask in the warmth of the day. As this beautiful day unfolds into the evening, a stroll through one of the nearby parks or enjoying a quiet moment at a local café seems fitting, encouraging one to linger in this delightful blend of fresh air and city energy.
